title: CT Scans of New vs. Used SawStop

digraph SawStop{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];A[label="New vs. Used SawStop" fontweight=bold fontsize=14];B[label="Table Saws: Dangerous Power Tools

- Operates by running electrical current
- Stops blade in < 5 milliseconds"];D[label="Components of SawStop"];E[label="Actuator Assembly
- Deploys pawl into blade
- Fuse wire critical for operation"];F[label="Controller
- Digital Signal Processor (DSP)
- Monitors signal for safety"];G[label="Pawl
- Soft yet strong
- Designed for fast deployment"];H[label="Locking Pin
- Secures brake to saw
- Maintains contact during operation"];I[label="Comparison: New vs. Used SawStop"];J[label="Used SawStop Insights

- Evidence of trigger mechanism"];K[label="Future of SawStop
